speaker.name: Ivan Burazin
speaker.title: CEO at Codeanywhere
speaker.bio: Ivan is the founder of the Shift Conference. Alongside this he co-founded Codeanywhere, the first cross platform Cloud IDE, which now has over a million users worldwide.

title: The Soul in The Machine - Developing for Humans

speaker.name: Christian Heilmann
speaker.title: HTML5/Open Web Evangelist at Microsoft
speaker.bio: Originally coming from a radio journalism background, he built his first web site around 1997 and spent the following years working on large, international web sites.

title: Why Your IT Project is Likely to Fail

speaker.name: Andrea Grisogono
speaker.title: Product Manager at Appacus
speaker.bio: Andrea is a product manager with 11 years of experience who is passionate about leading teams that develop amazing apps. Loves free-climbing and extra dark chocolate.

title: Big Data Analytics - How to Deal with Billions of Data Rows

speaker.name: Goran Cvijanović
speaker.title: Principal Engineer
speaker.bio: With more than 20 years of experience, Goran is a Team Lead for Analytical Platform, designing modern Big Data BI systems for supporting company's core business.

speaker.name: Stefan Thies
speaker.title: DevOps Evangelist at Sematext
speaker.bio: Stefan is passionate about scalable system architectures and he contributes to several Node.js open source projects related to monitoring, logging or distributed systems.

title: Migrating to micro-services based platform in live environments

speaker.name: Robert Raca
speaker.title: Developer at Aduro
speaker.bio: Robert is experienced in system and architectural design. He was one of architects of the migration to micro-services and switch to GOLANG as the main language in Aduro idea.

speaker.name: Ivo Lukač
speaker.title: Web Technologist at NetGen
speaker.bio: Managing partner at Netgen, more than 12 years of experience in building complex web solutions, spoken at many conferences, organizing Web Summer Camp from 2012.

title: React State Management with Redux and MobX

speaker.name: Darko Kukovec
speaker.title: JavaScript Team Lead at Infinum
speaker.bio: Darko Kukovec is a JavaScript Team Lead at Infinum. In his free time, he experiments with node.js, browser extensions, manipulating CSS and everything else JavaScript related.
